title: Tobe! Pegasus Kokoro no Goal ni Shoot
synopsis: The movie is about the soccer team Pegasus created from the visually impaired children studying in the Chiba Prefectural School for the Blind.
voices: ['Hori, Hideyuki', 'Hibino, Akari', 'Hirano, Masato', 'Takano, Urara', 'Ishimura, Tomoko', 'Iwatsubo, Rie', 'Okano, Kousuke']
staff: [['Okuda, Seiji', ['Director']], ['Sokuza, Makoto', ['Episode Director']], ['Kodama, Kenji', ['Storyboard']], ['Miyamae, Mitsuharu', ['Art Director']]]
